column2:
"Too many ARKS members these days never get around
to affixing their favorite weapons and units.
This is unacceptable, if you ask me."

"If you affix your weapons and armor units just
right, you can build yourself the most trusty fighting
tools you could even imagine."

"What about you? Maybe it's time you did a little
affixing yourself. So get to it."

"Get to what? Haven't you been listening? You'd
best pay attention. Now get your butt to the lab
and get to augmenting."

"Well, what are you waiting for? It's not rocket
science. Now go put my mind at ease, all right?"

"This is an explanation of adding abilities.

Weapons can be improved by attaching abilities to them
subjective to the type of ability that was attached.

Weapon abilities
can be added at the Item Lab.

Below are some examples of ability effects.
Power I...S-ATK +10
Stamina II... HP +40
Luck I...Item drop rate +5%

*There are a variety of abilities other than these."

"You need the following to complete an ability:
- Meseta
- Component weapon or armor unit

You can add whatever you want from the abilities of the
component item. The component item must have the same number
of abilities as the base item, except when the base item
has none at all, in which case the number does not matter."

"The chance of abilities being passed on depends on the
quantity and level. Try to create a special item that is all your own."
